name: Body building
comment: Bodybuilding focuses on sculpting and developing muscle mass through targeted resistance training and nutrition strategies

name: Personal training
comment: Personal training provides tailored guidance and support to help individuals achieve their fitness goals efficiently and effectively.

name: Group fitness classes
comment: Group fitness classes offer a dynamic and motivating environment where individuals can engage in structured workouts led by experienced instructors>

name: Strength training
comment: Strength training involves resistance exercises aimed at building muscle mass, increasing strength, and improving overall physical performance
